<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <rss version="2.0" xml:base="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"> <channel> <title>News from healthcareitnews.com</title>
 <description>Healthcare IT News is the industry’s authoritative source covering the people, policy and technology driving next-generation healthcare in the U.S. For more than 12 years, it has been the voice of health IT, delivering editorial insights about compelling topics such as electronic health records, health information exchange, privacy and security, data analytics, patient engagement, population health and revenue cycle management.</description>

 <item> <title>6 privacy landmines and how to avoid stepping on them</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/6-privacy-landmines-and-how-avoid-stepping-them</link>
 <description>A healthcare attorney spotlights big problems and offers advice on ways to navigate around the pitfalls, from cybersecurity insurance to HIPAA to social media to responding to patient requesting access to their medial records. 
</description>
 <author>Tom Sullivan</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/privacy-security">Privacy &amp; Security</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/6-privacy-landmines-and-how-avoid-stepping-them</comments>

 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 17:10:51 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>How HIPAA applies to the burgeoning world of mobile health</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/how-hipaa-applies-burgeoning-world-mobile-health</link>
 <description>The federal regulatory environment has not kept pace with the progress of mobile health, which is driven by consumers who expect to have all sorts of information, including health data, on their phones.
</description>
 <author>Bill Siwicki</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/compliance-legal">Compliance &amp; Legal</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/government">Government &amp; Policy</category>

 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/how-hipaa-applies-burgeoning-world-mobile-health</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Mobile%20Security-HITN_0.png" length="36257" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/how-hipaa-applies-burgeoning-world-mobile-health</guid>
 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:18:32 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>AHRQ grants $1.9 million for patient-centered outcomes research network</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ahrq-grants-19-million-patient-centered-outcomes-research-network</link>
 <description>The Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality will dedicate nearly $2 million for the creation of the PCOR Clinical Decision Support Learning Network, aiming to address the barriers hindering the incorporation of patient-centered outcomes research into CDS tools.
</description>
 <author>Jessica Davis</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/analytics">Analytics</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/clinical">Clinical</category>

 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/government">Government &amp; Policy</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/population-health">Population Health</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ahrq-grants-19-million-patient-centered-outcomes-research-network</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Blumenfeld-HITN.png" length="216208" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ahrq-grants-19-million-patient-centered-outcomes-research-network</guid>
 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 15:48:59 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>HIMSS spotlights nursing informatics with tribute to Florence Nightingale</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/himss-spotlights-nursing-informatics-tribute-florence-nightingale</link>
 <description>The HIMSS Innovation Center is presenting a display to Florence Nightingale on the anniversary of her birthday, May 12, which is also Nursing Informatics Awareness Day. She was born in 1820.
Nightingale is considered to be the founder of modern nursing, and many people in the field of healthcare look to her as having built the foundation for nursing informatics.</description>
 <author>bernie.monegain@medtechmedia.com (Bernie Monegain)</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/analytics">Analytics</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/clinical">Clinical</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/topics/women-health-it">Women In Health IT</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/himss-spotlights-nursing-informatics-tribute-florence-nightingale</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Nightingale-HITN.png" length="471521" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/himss-spotlights-nursing-informatics-tribute-florence-nightingale</guid>
 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:24:14 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>Ardent Health Services to implement Epic EHR</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ardent-health-services-implement-epic-ehr</link>
 <description>Nashville-based Ardent Health Services, which operates hospitals in Oklahoma, New Mexico and Texas, plans to unite all its hospitals and physician groups on an Epic Systems EHR platform.
</description>
 <author>bernie.monegain@medtechmedia.com (Bernie Monegain)</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/electronic-health-records">Electronic Health Records</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/interoperability">Interoperability</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/network-infrastructure">Network Infrastructure</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ardent-health-services-implement-epic-ehr</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Ardent-HITN.png" length="473881" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ardent-health-services-implement-epic-ehr</guid>
 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 11:00:04 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>Post-acute IT 'getting interesting' as attention turns to EHRs, analytics, interoperability</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/post-acute-it-getting-interesting-attention-turns-ehrs-analytics-interoperability</link>
 <description>After years of dwelling in the shadows of healthcare, the long-term and post-acute care industry may finally be ready to join its hospital colleagues in the IT spotlight.
 
</description>
 <author>jandrews@medtechpublishing.com (John Andrews)</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/accountable-care">Accountable Care</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/analytics">Analytics</category>

 <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:07:26 -0400</pubDate>

</item>
 <item> <title>Ponemon: 89 percent of healthcare entities experienced data breaches</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ponemon-89-percent-healthcare-entities-experienced-data-breaches</link>
 <description>Nearly 90 percent of healthcare organizations have experienced data breaches, and for the second year in a row criminal attacks are the leading cause of breaches in healthcare, according to the Sixth Annual Benchmark Study on Privacy and Security of Healthcare Data.
</description>
 <author>Bill Siwicki</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/privacy-security">Privacy &amp; Security</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ponemon-89-percent-healthcare-entities-experienced-data-breaches</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Ponemon-HITN.png" length="257724" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/ponemon-89-percent-healthcare-entities-experienced-data-breaches</guid>
 <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 20:31:39 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>NIH appoints Patricia Flatley Brennan director of the National Library of Medicine</title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/nih-appoints-patricia-flatley-brennan-director-national-library-medicine</link>
 <description>Patricia Flatley Brennan, a professor at the University of Wisconsin at Madison, and a former practicing nurse with a Ph.D. in industrial engineering, will take the lead as director at the National Library of Medicine.
The NLM is the world's largest biomedical library and the producer of digital information services used by scientists, health professionals and members of the public worldwide.</description>
 <author>bernie.monegain@medtechmedia.com (Bernie Monegain)</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/clinical">Clinical</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/data-warehousing">Data Warehousing</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/government">Government &amp; Policy</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/topics/women-health-it">Women In Health IT</category>
 <comments>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/nih-appoints-patricia-flatley-brennan-director-national-library-medicine</comments>
 <enclosure url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/sites/default/files/Brennan-HITN.png" length="398880" type="image/png" />
 <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/nih-appoints-patricia-flatley-brennan-director-national-library-medicine</guid>
 <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 16:43:15 -0400</pubDate>
 <source url="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/home/feed">News from healthcareitnews.com</source>
</item>
 <item> <title>NIST fellow Ron Ross reveals how to solve 90 percent of cyberbreaches </title>
 <link>http://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/nist-fellow-ron-ross-reveals-how-solve-90-percent-cyberbreaches</link>
 <description>LOS ANGELES — Building on several best practices and basic blocking and tackling of cybersecurity, healthcare organizations must also take a higher-level view to effectively address the problems of today.</description>
 <author>Tom Sullivan</author>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/network-infrastructure">Network Infrastructure</category>
 <category domain="http://www.healthcareitnews.com/category/resource-topic/privacy-security">Privacy &amp; Security</category>

</item>
 <item> <title>Telemedicine – A Growing Enabler of the Triple Aim and Shift to Value-Based Care</title>

 <description>(SPONSORED) There is an unprecedented convergence occurring between healthcare and technology – and telemedicine is an increasingly important initiative in the connected health market.
</description>
